name: good-first-issue
description: Making your first open-source contribution is easier than you think

scripts.test: poetry run python gfi/test_data.py && poetry run mypy gfi/*.py
scripts.format: poetry run ruff format . && bunx prettier --write .
scripts.lint: poetry run ruff check . && bunx prettier --check .
scripts.setup: cp data/generated.sample.json data/generated.json && cp data/tags.sample.json data/tags.json
